entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
